channel.title: CVE Feed for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- ioSmart Gen1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- ioSmart Gen1

item.title: CVE-2023-0248|2023-12-15T21:16:03.463Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- iosmart%20gen1
item.description: An attacker with physical access to the Kantech Gen1 ioSmart card reader with firmware version prior to 1.07.02 in certain circumstances can recover the reader's communication memory between the card and reader.
